name: Santa E=mc^2
description:
Project for a game jam with topic "Save Christmas" and special object "Santas hat"

20.12.2021: Idea & Music
21.12.2021: Programming & Arts
22.12.2021: Programming & Arts
24.12.2021: Level Design
Engine: Unity (2D)
Arts: Aseprite
Sound: https://beepbox.co

Description
Santa does not seem to be too happy about christmas.. However, he wants to deliver presents in order to save parents from their kids crying too loud.

Controls
Introduction: Move with A and D buttons, jump with space button
Game: Move with A and D buttons, disable and reactive physics with P button
